channel.title: Vitality Finally Rises!
channel.description:
[b][center][size=14pt]http://vitalityrsps.com/Play.html http://vitalityrsps.com/forums http://vitalityrsps.com/vote http://vitalityrsps.com/highscores[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]First 25 People On Line Get a Free Gift! :)[/size][/center]
We've got a 24/7 server and website, and we've got fully functional and licensed Vbulletin forums. Our development team keep on top of any problem and we listen to any glitches or suggestions and ensure we work on them.
Here's a list of some of our best features
[ul][li]Fullscreen/Resizable Shooting Stars! Tab to Reply to PM Page up automatically says your last said message Z Buffering(FOG) Perfect tweening(makes the animations look extremely smooth) Fully working bank tabs Dungeoneering Full summoning with pouch and scroll creation, and summoning monster special attacks Fully working shooting stars with brilliant rewards and randomized locations! A great way to train up your mining level! Choose from 5 different EXP RATES! Many quests to keep you busy when you don't want to train! All skills fully working Zooming 667 Graphics 20+ bosses including Skeletal Horror and Avatars Unique training zones A refferal system for you to earn money when your friends reffer you AWESOME and PERFECT minigames 20+ Clue Scrolls! Quests! Never seen before staff system Many points and ways to obtain them(Yell points, vote points, donator points etc etc) FLAWLESS PKING Perfect switching Prestiging system with a shop for each prestige level Unique donating system Brilliant shops Superb economy Full ClanChat system with ranks Stunning Client Jrebel, meaning every update we do, we don't need to restart the server Perfect Cache Updater An AWESOME splash screen which automatically UPDATES the Jar client, meaning you don't have to keep re-downloading to obtain every client update Fully working PARTY ROOM![/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bY490Mq.gif[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/4LWldiC.gif[/img] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qHKolMj.gif[/img][/center]
Thanks for reading, and I hope to see you online soon.

item.title: Vitality Finally Rises!
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

It looks pretty cool, you should fix those images though because most people won’t take the time to look at the links

Read full topic

item.title: Vitality Finally Rises!
item.dc:creator: @m_boxes m_boxes
item.description:
@m_boxes wrote:

[b][center][size=14pt]http://vitalityrsps.com/Play.html
http://vitalityrsps.com/forums
http://vitalityrsps.com/vote
http://vitalityrsps.com/highscores[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]First 25 People On Line Get a Free Gift! :)[/size][/center]

We’ve got a 24/7 server and website, and we’ve got fully functional and licensed Vbulletin forums. Our development team keep on top of any problem and we listen to any glitches or suggestions and ensure we work on them.

Here’s a list of some of our best features

[ul][li]Fullscreen/Resizable
Shooting Stars!
Tab to Reply to PM
Page up automatically says your last said message
Z Buffering(FOG)
Perfect tweening(makes the animations look extremely smooth)
Fully working bank tabs
Dungeoneering
Full summoning with pouch and scroll creation, and summoning monster special attacks
Fully working shooting stars with brilliant rewards and randomized locations! A great way to train up your mining level!
Choose from 5 different EXP RATES!
Many quests to keep you busy when you don’t want to train!
All skills fully working
Zooming
667 Graphics
20+ bosses including Skeletal Horror and Avatars
Unique training zones
A refferal system for you to earn money when your friends reffer you
AWESOME and PERFECT minigames
20+ Clue Scrolls!
Quests!
Never seen before staff system
Many points and ways to obtain them(Yell points, vote points, donator points etc etc)
FLAWLESS PKING
Perfect switching
Prestiging system with a shop for each prestige level
Unique donating system
Brilliant shops
Superb economy
Full ClanChat system with ranks
Stunning Client
Jrebel, meaning every update we do, we don’t need to restart the server
Perfect Cache Updater
An AWESOME splash screen which automatically UPDATES the Jar client, meaning you don’t have to keep re-downloading to obtain every client update
Fully working PARTY ROOM![/li][/ul]


[center][/center]

Thanks for reading, and I hope to see you online soon.
